# Class Knowledge

Class for knowledge management Implementation of KnowledgeInterface, provides access to knowledge management functionality

##### Index

### Methods

compileKnowledge destroy getKnowledge removeKnowledge

## Methods

### compileKnowledge

  * compileKnowledge(  
knowledgeId: string,  
recordsOrFile: string[] | File,  
): Promise<string[]>

Compiles knowledge into the knowledge base

#### Parameters

    * knowledgeId: string

ID of the knowledge to compile (must start with 'knowledge/' prefix)

    * recordsOrFile: string[] | File

Records or file to be compiled

#### Returns Promise<string[]>

Array of strings containing the resulting knowledge records

#### Throws

InworldError If compilation fails

Implementation of KnowledgeInterface.compileKnowledge




### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Destroys the native object

#### Returns void

Implementation of KnowledgeInterface.destroy




### getKnowledge

  * getKnowledge(knowledgeGetInput: [KnowledgeGetInput](/interfaces/primitives_knowledge_types.KnowledgeGetInput)): Promise<string[]>

Retrieves knowledge from the knowledge base

#### Parameters

    * knowledgeGetInput: [KnowledgeGetInput](/interfaces/primitives_knowledge_types.KnowledgeGetInput)

Input parameters containing knowledge IDs and event history

#### Returns Promise<string[]>

Array of strings containing retrieved knowledge data as individual records

#### Throws

InworldError If retrieval fails

Implementation of KnowledgeInterface.getKnowledge




### removeKnowledge

  * removeKnowledge(knowledgeId: string): Promise<void>

Removes knowledge from the knowledge base

#### Parameters

    * knowledgeId: string

ID of the knowledge to remove (must start with 'knowledge/' prefix)

#### Returns Promise<void>

#### Throws

InworldError If removal fails

Implementation of KnowledgeInterface.removeKnowledge
